AlarmData.Name: UNDEFINED_ERROR
AlarmData.Description_KOR: 정의되지않은 알람이 호출되었습니다. 프로그램 로그를 확인하세요

AlarmData.Name: PORT BCR READ FAIL
AlarmData.Solution_KOR: 1. BCR 셋팅 또는 제품 Barcode 상태 확인
AlarmData.Solution_ENG: 1. BCR CAM Setting and Product Barcode Check
AlarmData.Solution_CHN: 1. BCR CAM Setting and Product Barcode Check
AlarmData.Solution_HUN: 1. Vonalkód beállításai, vagy ellenőrizze a termék vonalkódjának állapotát

AlarmData.Name: PORT BCR NOT RESPONSE
AlarmData.Solution_KOR: BCR 작동여부를 확인 후 고장시 교체한다.
AlarmData.Solution_ENG: Check BCR operation and replace it in case of failure.
AlarmData.Solution_CHN: Check BCR operation and replace it in case of failure.
AlarmData.Solution_HUN: BCR indítás után hiba esetén cserélje ki.

AlarmData.Name: MCS ABNORMAL ROUTE RECEIVED
AlarmData.Description_ENG: Transmission of anomalous paths in MCS
AlarmData.Description_CHN: Transmission of anomalous paths in MCS
AlarmData.Solution_HUN: Vegye fel a kapcsolatot az MCS-vel.

AlarmData.Name: MCS BUZZER
AlarmData.Solution_KOR: MCS에 해당 제품에 대한 NG 사유를 확인하세요.
AlarmData.Solution_ENG: Check the NG reason for the corresponding product in the MCS
AlarmData.Solution_CHN: Check the NG reason for the corresponding product in the MCS
AlarmData.Solution_HUN: Ellenőrizze a megfelelő termék NG okát az MCS-ben

AlarmData.Name: MCS DATA MISMATCH
AlarmData.Solution_HUN: Vegye fel a kapcsolatot az MCS-vel.

AlarmData.Name: HAND BCR NO READ
AlarmData.Solution_KOR: BCR 작동여부를 확인 후 고장시 교체한다.
AlarmData.Solution_ENG: Check BCR operation and replace it in case of failure.
AlarmData.Solution_CHN: Check BCR operation and replace it in case of failure.
AlarmData.Solution_HUN: BCR indítás után hiba esetén cserélje ki.

AlarmData.Name: MCP FRONT DOOR OPEN2
AlarmData.Solution_KOR: 1. Door 체크 후 경고 상태를 해제 시켜주십시오.
AlarmData.Solution_ENG: Please release the warning after checking Door.
AlarmData.Solution_CHN: Please release the warning after checking Door.
AlarmData.Solution_HUN: 1. Az ajtó ellenőrzése után törölje a figyelmeztetés állapotát.

AlarmData.Name: MCP REAR DOOR OPEN2
AlarmData.Solution_KOR: 1. Door 체크 후 경고 상태를 해제 시켜주십시오.
AlarmData.Solution_ENG: Please release the warning after checking Door.
AlarmData.Solution_CHN: Please release the warning after checking Door.
AlarmData.Solution_HUN: 1. Az ajtó ellenőrzése után törölje a figyelmeztetés állapotát.

AlarmData.Name: CIM HEART BEAT STOP1
AlarmData.Solution_KOR: 1. 통신카드 상태 확인 및 랜케이블 점검. 2. SCS 프로그램 실행 확인
AlarmData.Solution_ENG: 1. Check the status of the communication card in the panel and check the LAN cable. 2. Check SCS program execution
AlarmData.Solution_CHN: 1. Check the status of the communication card in the panel and check the LAN cable. 2. Check SCS program execution
AlarmData.Solution_HUN: 1. Ellenőrizze a kommunikációs kártya állapotát és a LAN-kábelt. 2. Ellenőrizze az SCS program végrehajtását
